message: Let's split the money evenly. This way, we both get a fair share.
I'll take the majority, you can have the rest. It's only fair.
I propose an equal division of the funds. This ensures fairness and mutual benefit.
I'll take the lion's share, you can have a small consolation prize.
I suggest a division that reflects the diminishing value of money with each round. This proposal aims to be fair while considering the decreasing worth of our offers.
